Articles.Content:
After going to all the planets in Kerbol but Jool or Eeloo I embark on a one hour trip to Eeloo onboard was Lueny Kerman, Dunming Kerman, and Tombus Kerman. They are currently doing research.... Erm or should be doing research while staying in a stable orbit of 5600 Km. We plan to land it on Laythe since it has a Kerbin like atmosphere..... [End Transmisssion]

Edited March 7, 2015 by ghostbuzzer7

Hmm.... that orbit is suspicious.

Oh. That's not stock, is it? Those parts are odd.

I used the Ion Hybrid Electric Pack

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/31286-0-22-Ion-Hybrid-Electric-Pack-30-08-13-Soon-FKSP!!!-See-Development-Monitor

and ZG-27 fuel synthesizers in which I didnt use only when I got into orbit of Jool. Other than that pretty stock.

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/224606-zg-27-fuel-synthesizers-1-2-1

I used the sun's periapsis to get me there after passing minimus it slingshot me directly into Jool's gravitational pull. I got luck
This thread has been shift over to the subforum for player-made videos.
